title: NetHack 3.1.3/URL list
data:
These are the URLs to obtain the original NetHack 3.1.3 postings. You can click on the URLs, but it will be much easier to copy and paste to a script for [wget](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/wget "wikipedia:wget").

## From Google Groups

These might be considered authoritative, except that Google Groups munges email addresses to discourage spammers from harvesting them. It hardly matters if the Usenet headers are altered, but some sources contain email addresses (which have probably long since disappeared) and some [uuencoded](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/uuencode "wikipedia:uuencode") files could possibly be corrupted.

```
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/6hxdC5zJam8/lTE5LMHkc5AJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/1FgldiTVIHI/zyIMivVFDJcJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/_vYShKP-YpE/-UHEFXsp5C8J
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/p__6M2juRnU/i_7UBrd6vmAJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/SQlmmmTLLWc/M0s0-mVz5cwJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/AXaphXSHaXc/3KBjNgMPmkUJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/ZzvPFlO3DgE/rLj7OQqC7MIJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/FE0AF7SQ-XE/gqiyw3THM4kJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/YofyvErDo64/WYBwjDnrbwQJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/0t00q5034wo/GQA81nn5Gu0J
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/yxDVHAIkLis/HeclA0KYURIJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/32dYDrx1jiI/iouA_j-tZEkJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/LP_ZqQ6nL4A/esgJAQF834YJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/m-qQqJ7pTYI/eAGh5KxV-MoJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/tabVgIvgJsw/57NThTFu-rQJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/V7aR4stjBVI/NO-_1vUNWbUJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/vrTU8yuM3LE/7-dHyMlPVf8J
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/lmeqgFfZdAQ/24-RVimKUCoJ
```

## From GitHub

These files are saved from the UUNet FTP site, while that site still operated. They can be compared to the Google Groups versions to check their authenticity.

```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chasonr/nethack-origins/master/nethack-3.1.3/patch3a
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chasonr/nethack-origins/master/nethack-3.1.3/patch3b
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chasonr/nethack-origins/master/nethack-3.1.3/patch3c
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chasonr/nethack-origins/master/nethack-3.1.3/patch3d
```

html:
NetHack 3.1.3/URL list

From NetHackWiki
< NetHack 3.1.3
Jump to navigation Jump to search

These are the URLs to obtain the original NetHack 3.1.3 postings. You can click on the URLs, but it will be much easier to copy and paste to a script for wget.

From Google Groups

These might be considered authoritative, except that Google Groups munges email addresses to discourage spammers from harvesting them. It hardly matters if the Usenet headers are altered, but some sources contain email addresses (which have probably long since disappeared) and some uuencoded files could possibly be corrupted. 

https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/6hxdC5zJam8/lTE5LMHkc5AJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/1FgldiTVIHI/zyIMivVFDJcJ

https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/32dYDrx1jiI/iouA_j-tZEkJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/LP_ZqQ6nL4A/esgJAQF834YJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/m-qQqJ7pTYI/eAGh5KxV-MoJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/tabVgIvgJsw/57NThTFu-rQJ
https://groups.google.com/forum/message/raw?msg=comp.sources.games/V7aR4stjBVI/NO-_1vUNWbUJ

From GitHub

These files are saved from the UUNet FTP site, while that site still operated. They can be compared to the Google Groups versions to check their authenticity. 

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chasonr/nethack-origins/master/nethack-3.1.3/patch3a

== From Google Groups ==

These might be considered authoritative, except that Google Groups munges email addresses to discourage spammers from harvesting them.
